title: RAG-CLI Settings Schema
description: JSON Schema for RAG-CLI configuration validation

auto_trigger_threshold.description: Minimum query length to trigger RAG automatically

context_limit.description: Maximum number of context chunks to include

relevance_threshold.description: Minimum relevance score for including results

vector_weight.description: Weight for vector similarity in hybrid search

keyword_weight.description: Weight for keyword matching in hybrid search

enable_online_retrieval.description: Enable online retrieval (ArXiv, Tavily, web scraping)

enable_semantic_caching.description: Enable semantic caching for query results
